task.summary: split modified_typer into modular (as was used in old Debian distribution) and monolithic (current distribution of typer).
Started to adapt dialyzer-4.4.4 to Statechum - need to do it in steps so that changes can be applied to subsequent versions of dialyzer
Migration to newer OTP continuing, a lot of work still pending.
Added a simple parser for DOT file format.
Early Dec 2022 updates - minor changes plus some OTP migration
Added parser and dumper for Erlang maps
Initial edition of MapSignature and minor improvements to modified typer.
Revised the version of typer so that one of the tests using typer now passes on Erlang 24.
Erlang Module tests now pass in Erlang Otp 24.
More Erlang tests pass, many Synapse tests still fail.
All current Erlang tests pass with OpenJDK and OTP 24.
Merged experimental branch into main and resolved conflicts to make sure that the outcome builds. Running tests is next task.

MESSAGE.value: split modified_typer into modular (as was used in old Debian distribution) and monolithic (current distribution of typer).
Started to adapt dialyzer-4.4.4 to Statechum - need to do it in steps so that changes can be applied to subsequent versions of dialyzer
Migration to newer OTP continuing, a lot of work still pending.
Added a simple parser for DOT file format.
Early Dec 2022 updates - minor changes plus some OTP migration
Added parser and dumper for Erlang maps
Initial edition of MapSignature and minor improvements to modified typer.
Revised the version of typer so that one of the tests using typer now passes on Erlang 24.
Erlang Module tests now pass in Erlang 24.
Erlang Module tests now pass in Erlang Otp 24.
More Erlang tests pass, many Synapse tests still fail.
All current Erlang tests pass with OpenJDK and OTP 24.
Added tests for typer's handling of map types and another test for record type (which is the same as a tuple).
Merged experimental branch into main and resolved conflicts. Running tests is next task.
Merged experimental branch into main and resolved conflicts to make sure that the outcome builds. Running tests is next task.
Updated to run on JDK 8. Fast tests pass.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Updated to run on JDK 8. Fast tests pass.
